activities: Verasys Worldwide LLC conducts pre-employment and employment screeing for businesses and corporations for the purposes of providing these clients the necessary information required to make informed employment screening decision.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
If an data subject believes that any information reported about s/he by Verasys Worldwide is not completely accurate, that person can request Verasys Worldwide to conduct that part of the background investigation again to resolve any issue in dispute.
This re-verification of the disputed information will be at no cost to the individual.
If the individual is still not satisfied with the results of the disputed information the person can report the dispute to the Federal Trade Commission (FTC)and the EU DPA. Verasys Worldwide agrees to cooperate and comply with any decision of the FTC and/or EU DPA.
